## Revisit exercise from last class

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
Bangladesh_gw <- read_csv("https://stahlm.github.io/ENS_215/Data/BGS_DPHE_to_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
Bangladesh_gw %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = PARAMETER, y = CONC)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  
  scale_y_log10() 
```


Clean and tidy the data

```{r}
bgs_clean <- Bangladesh_gw %>% 
  separate(col = LAT_LONG, into = c("LAT", "LONG"), sep = "/" ) %>% 
  separate(col = DIVISION_DISTRICT, into = c("DIVISION", "DISTRICT"), sep = "-") %>% 
  
  pivot_wider(names_from = "PARAMETER", values_from = "CONC")# %>% 
  #drop_na()
```
